The claim that former U: S. President George W. Bush endorsed Democratic presidential nominee Joe Biden is not accurate.
The picture circulating on social media: Bush with the text endorsing Biden is misleading and false.
Bush: s spokesperson, Freddy Ford, confirmed that the former president has not endorsed either Biden or U.S. President Donald Trump.
The Dallas News reported that George W: Bush and his wife, Laura, have chosen to keep their voting decision private and will not disclose how they voted in the 2020 presidential race.
